name: Noah's Help
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare 42 (Running out of space!)

Drag animals with the mouse into the tiles on the raft.

Press Spacebar or R while dragging an animal to rotate it.

 Can you beat all 16 levels?

(Try pressing the fullscreen button in the bottom right, the game looks better fullscreen!)

Rate the game at the Ludum Dare entry page here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/noahs-help-1

CHANGELOG:

1. Fixed a small issue where an animal would infrequently look like it had snapped into place, but it had not.

2. Fixed a Unity WebGL build issue where the mouse pointer would get completely stuck.
